alert.note: Alert for Franklin; St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 4:10PM EDT until August 31 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Franklin County in northern New York... Southeastern St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 410 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North Russell to near Russell to near Hermon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Canton, Parishville, Colton, Carry Falls Reservoir, Degrasse, Richville, Hermon, Lake Ozonia, Pierrepont, Russell, Stark, Pyrites, West Parishville, Higley Flow State Park, North Russell, Shurtleff, South Colton, Hannawa Falls and West Pierrepont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
